mapper.select:
SELECT cp.id,cp.case_id,cp.paid_time,cp.sur_time,cp.cancel_reason,ci.entrust_rate,ci.case_code,ci.case_name,ci.case_num,ci.case_card,ci.agent_rate, ci.mobile1,ci.case_money,ci.case_assigned_id,ci.in_derate,ci.out_derate,ci.case_file_no, cb.batch_code,en.name AS entrustName,cp.in_derate AS inDerateNew,cp.out_derate AS outDerateNew, cb.entrust_id,cp.paid_num,cp.cp_money,cp.is_derate,cb.achieve, cp.cp_time,cp.state,cp.se_no,ei.user_name AS cpName,so.name AS SONAME,ei.org_id,cp.sur_remark,
vr.actual_visit_time,vr.visit_user,
ar.name AS areaName, CASE WHEN (ci.case_money - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(paid_num),0) FROM case_paid WHERE case_id = cp.case_id AND state='2')) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (ci.case_money - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(paid_num),0) FROM case_paid WHERE case_id = cp.case_id AND state='2')) END AS surplusMoney, CASE WHEN cp.state='1' THEN cp.cp_money * (ci.entrust_rate) ELSE cp.paid_num * (ci.entrust_rate) END AS compBorker, cp.back_paid AS commission, ci.color, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM attachment att WHERE att.is_junk='1' and att.fk_id=cp.id ) AS fzsize,cp.repay_type,
ci.account_no,ci.loan_contract,ci.cus_no,ci.currency,ci.overdue_days,ci.overdue_age,ci.end_date,ci.remark1,ci.sales_dep FROM case_paid cp INNER JOIN case_info ci ON cp.case_id=ci.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON ci.batch_id=cb.id LEFT JOIN entrust en ON cb.entrust_id=en.id LEFT JOIN employee_info ei ON cp.se_no=ei.id LEFT JOIN sys_organization so ON ei.org_id=so.id LEFT JOIN AREA ar ON ci.area_id=ar.id
LEFT JOIN ( select * from( SELECT actual_visit_time, visit_user,case_id FROM visit_record WHERE state='4' order by actual_visit_time desc) temp GROUP BY case_id order by actual_visit_time desc) vr ON vr.case_id=cp.case_id
WHERE cp.state!=0 and ci.status != -1 and cb.status != -1
and cp.id in
#{id}
order by cp.state,cp.create_time desc,cp_time desc
SELECT * from case_paid where case_id=#{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR } and state=0 and ptp_money>0

SELECT cp.id,cp.case_id,cp.paid_time,ci.case_code,ci.case_name,ci.case_num,ci.case_card,ci.entrust_rate, ci.mobile1,ci.case_money,ci.case_assigned_id,ci.in_derate,ci.out_derate,ci.case_file_no, cb.batch_code,en.name AS entrustName,cp.in_derate AS inDerateNew,cp.out_derate AS outDerateNew, cb.entrust_id,cp.paid_num,cp.cp_money,cp.is_derate,cb.achieve, cp.cp_time,cp.state,cp.se_no,ei.user_name AS cpName,so.name AS SONAME,ei.org_id,ci.state, ar.name AS areaName, CASE WHEN (ci.case_money - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(paid_num),0) FROM case_paid WHERE case_id = cp.case_id AND state='2')) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (ci.case_money - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(paid_num),0) FROM case_paid WHERE case_id = cp.case_id AND state='2')) END AS surplusMoney FROM case_paid cp INNER JOIN case_info ci ON cp.case_id=ci.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON ci.batch_id=cb.id LEFT JOIN entrust en ON cb.entrust_id=en.id LEFT JOIN employee_info ei ON cp.se_no=ei.id LEFT JOIN sys_organization so ON ei.org_id=so.id LEFT JOIN AREA ar ON ci.area_id=ar.id WHERE cp.state!=0 AND ci.state IN (0,1,4) and cp.id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update case_paid
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ptp_time = #{ptpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ptp_money = #{ptpMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cp_time = #{cpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cp_money = #{cpMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paid_time = #{paidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paid_num = #{paidNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sur_user = #{surUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sur_time = #{surTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_emp_id = #{operateEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sur_remark = #{surRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_user = #{delUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_time = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
m_paid = #{mPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cpm_paid = #{cpmPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
se_no = #{seNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cm_paid = #{cmPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
back_paid = #{backPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
back_paid_rate = #{backPaidRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pback_paid = #{pbackPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
last_debt_m = #{lastDebtM,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
left_amt = #{leftAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_emp_id = #{createEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_emp_id = #{modifyEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update case_paid
create_emp_id = #{createEmpId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sur_time = #{surTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_emp_id = #{operateEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
paid_time = #{paidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
back_paid = #{backPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
back_paid_rate = #{backPaidRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
entrust_paid = #{entrustPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
entrust_paid_rate = #{entrustPaidRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paid_num = #{paidNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_derate =#{isDerate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cancel_reason =#{cancelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_derate =#{outDerate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_derate =#{inDerate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sur_remark = #{surRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where case_paid.id = #{id}

update case_paid set state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ptp_time = #{ptpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ptp_money = #{ptpMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cp_time = #{cpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cp_money = #{cpMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paid_time = #{paidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paid_num = #{paidNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sur_user = #{surUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sur_time = #{surTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sur_remark = #{surRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_user = #{delUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_time = #{delTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, m_paid = #{mPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cpm_paid = #{cpmPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, se_no = #{seNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cm_paid = #{cmPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, back_paid = #{backPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pback_paid = #{pbackPaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, last_debt_m = #{lastDebtM,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, left_amt = #{leftAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_emp_id = #{createEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_emp_id = #{modifyEmpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: id, state, case_id, ptp_time, ptp_money, cp_time, cp_money, paid_time,paid_num, sur_user, sur_time, sur_remark, del_user, del_time, m_paid, cpm_paid, se_no,cm_paid, back_paid, pback_paid, last_debt_m, create_emp_id, create_time, modify_emp_id,modify_time,version
mapper.select:
SELECT cp.id,ci.case_code,ci.case_name,ci.case_num,ci.case_card,ci.mobile1,ci.case_money,ci.case_assigned_id, cb.batch_code,en.name as entrustName,cb.entrust_id,cp.paid_num,cp.cp_money,cp.cp_time,cp.ptp_money, cp.ptp_time, cp.state,ei.user_name,so.name as soName, ar.name as areaName FROM case_paid cp INNER JOIN case_info ci ON cp.case_id=ci.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON ci.batch_id=cb.id LEFT JOIN entrust en ON cb.entrust_id=en.id LEFT JOIN employee_info ei ON cp.se_no=ei.id LEFT JOIN sys_organization so ON ei.org_id=so.id LEFT JOIN area ar ON ci.area_id=ar.id WHERE 1=1
and cp.state like CONCAT('%','${params.state}','%' )
and entrust_id like CONCAT('%','${params.entrustId}','%' )
and cp_time BETWEEN '${params.cpTime}' AND'${params.cpTime1}'
and org_id like CONCAT('%','${params.orgId}','%' )
and so.user_name like CONCAT('%','${params.userName}','%' )
and case_name like CONCAT('%','${params.caseName}','%' )
and case_card like CONCAT('%','${params.caseCard}','%' )
and case_num like CONCAT('%','${params.caseNum}','%' )
and mobile1 like CONCAT('%','${params.mobile1}','%' )
and area.name like CONCAT('%','${params.name}','%' )
and cp.case_id='${params.caseId}'
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by cp.create_time desc, ci.case_code
mapper.insert: insert into case_paid (id, state, case_id, ptp_time, ptp_money, cp_time,cp_money, paid_time, paid_num, sur_user, sur_time, operate_emp_id, operate_time, sur_remark,del_user, del_time, m_paid, cpm_paid, se_no, cm_paid,back_paid,back_paid_rate,entrust_paid,entrust_paid_rate, pback_paid, last_debt_m, create_emp_id, create_time, modify_emp_id,modify_time,version,repay_type) values (#{id}, #{state}, #{caseId},#{ptpTime}, #{ptpMoney}, #{cpTime}, #{cpMoney}, #{paidTime}, #{paidNum},#{surUser}, #{surTime}, #{operateEmpId}, #{operateTime}, #{surRemark}, #{delUser}, #{delTime}, #{mPaid},#{cpmPaid}, #{seNo}, #{cmPaid}, #{backPaid},#{backPaidRate}, #{entrustPaid},#{entrustPaidRate}, #{pbackPaid}, #{lastDebtM},#{createEmpId}, #{createTime}, #{modifyEmpId}, #{modifyTime},#{version},#{repayType})
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM case_paid cp INNER JOIN case_info ci ON cp.case_id = ci.id LEFT JOIN case_batch cb ON ci.batch_id = cb.id LEFT JOIN entrust en ON cb.entrust_id = en.id LEFT JOIN employee_info ei ON cp.se_no = ei.id LEFT JOIN employee_info em ON cp.operate_emp_id = em.id LEFT JOIN sys_organization so ON ei.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN AREA ar ON ci.area_id = ar.id WHERE cp.state != 0 AND ci. STATUS != - 1 AND cb. STATUS != - 1 AND ( ci.org_id IN ( ${queryOrgs} )
OR cb.entrust_id IN (${attachEntrustId})
OR 1=1
) AND ei.org_id IN ( SELECT id FROM sys_organization WHERE path LIKE '${orgId}%' ) AND cp.state LIKE '1%'
